content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(117.5, -30.5)
Consists of a steam engine at position(117.5, -30.5), a boiler at position(111.5, -32.0), an offshore pump at position(107.5, -33.5), and a pipe group with steam fluid at position(117.5, -34.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(62.0, -54.0)
Consists of a furnae cat position(62.0, -54.0), a burner inserter at position(62.5, -55.5), and a belt at position(63.5, -53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
* Errors when inserting items into a furnace
  - Make sure to have the required items in the inventory before attempting to insert them into a furnace
* Errors when furnace has no ingredients
  - Ensure that the furnace has the required ingredients to smelt before attempting to use it
* Errors when inserter is waiting for source items
  - Make sure that the inserter has a source of items to pick up before attempting to use it

# NAMESPACE
* Defined functions: 
  - insert_item: Inserts an item into a furnace
  - get_entities: Gets the entities on the map
* Important variables: 
  - furnace: The furnace entity
  - inserter: The burner inserter entity
  - inventory: The current inventory of the agent
  - entities: The entities on the map
  - position: The position of an entity
  - direction: The direction of an entity
  - energy: The energy of an entity
  - status: The status of an entity
  - warnings: The warnings of an entity
  - fluid_box: The fluid box of an entity
  - fluid_systems: The fluid systems of an entity
  - connection_points: The connection points of an entity
  - neighbours: The neighbours of an entity
  - height: The height of an entity
  - width: The width of an entity
